This is a layer in the Alokai Middleware and Storefront that allows for unification of data from different sources. The UDL provides a standardized way to interact with data, regardless of the eCommerce platform you're using. The UDL provides a structured way to manage this data, ensuring that regardless of the platform — be it Commercetools, SAPCC, or BigCommerce — the data is consistently represented."}]},{"type":"element","tag":"h2","props":{"id":"prerequisites"},"children":[{"type":"text","value":"Prerequisites"}]},{"type":"element","tag":"p","props":{},"children":[{"type":"text","value":"Before we proceed, please take your time and learn more about the UDL in the "},{"type":"element","tag":"a","props":{"href":"https://docs.vuestorefront.io/storefront/unified-data-layer","rel":["nofollow"]},"children":[{"type":"text","value":"Unified Data Layer"}]},{"type":"text","value":" section of Storefront documentation."}]},{"type":"element","tag":"h2","props":{"id":"udl-in-alokai-react-native-application"},"children":[{"type":"text","value":"UDL in Alokai React Native Application"}]},{"type":"element","tag":"p","props":{},"children":[{"type":"text","value":"In order to help you understand Unified Data Layer better, let's add it to our Alokai React Native application.
